question: c:\documents\ on a Windows computer for reading

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: The use of forward slashes / replacing the Windows standard backslashes \ enables the path to be read correctly. The path followed by the filename enables the file to be opened but when reading a file read mode is preferable.
Since the file is located in a location different from the Python file an error will occur.

The use of forward slashes / replacing the Windows standard backslashes \ enables the path to be read correctly. The path followed by the filename enables the file to be opened and when reading a file read mode is preferable.

detailedSolution: The use of forward slashes / replacing the Windows standard backslashes \ enables the path to be read correctly. The path followed by the filename enables the file to be opened and when reading a file read mode is preferable.
